result.eng: Are we in time for the meeting?
result.ga: an bhfuil muid in am don chruinniú

result.html: an bhfuil muid in am don chruinniúAre we in time for the meeting?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil muid in am don ċruinniúAre we in time for the meeting?

result.html: beidh cruinniú againn amárachWe'll have a meeting tonmorrow.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ cruinniú againn amáraċWe'll have a meeting tonmorrow.

result.eng: We had a meeting with the new director.
result.ga: bhí cruinniú againn leis an stiúrthóir nua
result.orig: Bhí cruinniú againn leis an stiúrthóir nua

result.ponchtml: ḃí cruinniú againn leis an stiúrṫóir nuaWe had a meeting with the new director.

result.eng: I was attending meetings all day.

result.eng: There were hundreds of people at the public meeting.

result.eng: He always took the lead when there was a meeting.

result.eng: The governors' board is having a meeting.

result.eng: What dod you do after the meeting?

result.eng: I haven't managed to escape from the meeting.

result.eng: The matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.

result.eng: The meeting sucked all my energy out of me.

result.eng: The director is attending a meeting at the moment.

result.eng: Instead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ga: in áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.orig: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige

result.eng: She'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
